metadata.title: CVE-2018-8764 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Roland Gruber Softwareentwicklung LDAP Account Manager before 6.3 places aCSRF token in the sec_token parameter of a URI, which makes it easier forremote attackers to defeat a CSRF protection mechanism by leveraginglogging.

criterions.comment: ldap-account-manager: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
